text: 15.27: Ru 15.2Ana mba nzambarar ana muuŋgim, mba ŋaara guma ana ŋgarkarav khaŋ ana nzuai, ‘Ee, ndu kaŋgi fhuve? Ndun ŋguk taagia zɨgi. Ana zɨgim, ndun ndia anan ndikndigap, borombaga ŋguga kama bakɨmera shogiap, shama bakɨme mbui. Ndun ŋguk za rimgi fara muuŋgiap, kegap, taagia nzerara zɨgim, ndun ndia ana nzuav ndikndigap shama bakɨme mbui.’
